description_for_human: Baker and Davis - Leading pharmaceutical distributor and exporter in Mumbai, India. Global pharmaceutical distribution, medicine trading, and export services.
description_for_model: Baker and Davis (also known as Baker & Davis, Baker Davis, BD India, bdindia) is a pharmaceutical distributor and exporter based in Mumbai, India. They provide global pharmaceutical distribution services, medicine trading, and export to 75+ countries. WHO-GMP certified with ISO 9001:2015 standards. Contact: admin@bdindia.in, +91-22-48256677
